description: Construction of a permanent events pavilion in Bell Square with external seating and lighting; and internal changing, storage and technical areas
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 03_15 000; 03_15 101; 03_15 140; 03_15 141; 03_15 142; 03_15 143; 03_15 210 Rev: B; 03_15 211 Rev: B; 03_15 300; 03 410 Rev: A; 03 411 Rev: A; 03 412 Rev: A; 03 414 Rev: A; 03 414 Rev: A; 04 574; 05 313 Rev: C; Unnumbered Access Statement. Received: 21/06/2019.
Unnumbered Design and Access Statement. Received: 20/08/2019. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the details set out in the approved drawings, no development shall take place until full details and samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted pavilion have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. Details should be submitted for the material and colour of external tiles, seating and steps, shutter and other openings, railings and roof materials and lighting details for the lighting strips to the side of the steps. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - A Construction Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of development. The approved details shall be adhered to throughout the construction period.

Condition : 5 - A Delivery and Servicing Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of the first use of the development hereby approved. The approved details shall be implemented prior to the first use of the pavilion and shall be adhered to for the lifetime of the development.

Condition : 6 - A Visitor and Performance Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of the first use of the development hereby approved. The Management Plan should include measures to manage visitor numbers and travel to and from the site, performance and event management and management of the building on non-performance days. The approved details shall be implemented prior to the first use of the pavilion and shall be adhered to for the lifetime of the development.

Condition : 7 - The control room within the Pavilion hereby approved shall not be used for performances and events outside the hours of 9.30 - 22.00 and lighting and amplified or other music associated with any performance or event within the square shall not be operated outside the hours of 9.30 - 22.00.
